features: Bass Sound: Enjoy the clear sound and supreme comfort with the OneOdio FUSION headphones. Neodymium magnets drivers deliver powerful bass and clear details, great for playing musical instruments like guitar, and e-drum, listening to music, etc.

Built to Stay Comfortable: The soft padded ear cushions are specifically designed for monitor headphones' comfort and noise isolation. The headband is adjustable and stretchable for you to find the desired angle you like to fit in.

No More Adapter: A long-style 9.8-Foot cord easily reaches from the TV or stereo to your chair. A standard-sized 6.35mm plug and a 3.5mm plug are included. They both are completely detachable, you can plug in the mixer you want to use.

Single-sided Monitoring: 90° swiveling earcups for single-ear monitoring anytime; self-adjustable and flexible headband delivers a fatigue-free listening experience that can last for hours, perfect for monitoring and mixing.
Works With: All devices have a 3.5 or 6.35mm audio jack. Bass sound, durability, and comfort. These are the headphones you've been looking for.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hi-Res Audio Certified Hear music with Hi-Res audio compatibility, and enjoy the ultimate sound quality and original sound reproduction.

Bass Sound Powerful bass, clear vocal, and crisp high tones form a stereo sound. Comfortable & Multifunctional Over-ear Headphones Whether you own a home studio, or even if you work only from an internet cafe, they will allow you to work at any time without disturbing anyone else in the room. An Absolute Essential Choice for Podcasting With its padded ear cushions and adjustable headband, this set of headphones lets you comfortably record a podcast for hours on end.

Dual Headphone Jacks They have 3.5 and 6.35-millimeter jack ports included to fit various audio sources such as AMP, guitar, e-drum, speakers, mixers, or instruments. Luxurious Earmuff, Feel the Comfort Ultra-soft protein leather ear cushions fit perfectly over your ears, while the lightweight design keeps them comfortable for long listening sessions. Jack Lock & Inline Mic Design For ensuring a secure connection, we add a jack lock system on the stereo Aux cable. Also, you can use the mic button to pause or play music, and you can use it to answer or end a call.
Foldable & Portable 90° Rotatable Stretchable Size for Ear Cushions

Dual-duty cable & No more adapter: There are gold-plated 3.5mm & 6.35mm plugs on each end of the audio cable, just simply plug in according to your needs, and no more trouble finding a single adapter. Ideal for mixers, electric guitars, keyboards, and more. Wired music sharing: Pair your device via a 3.5mm black cable and share your tunes through the red cable! Then you can share your music and videos with your friends. Bass sound: Powerful bass sound, clear details, great for playing musical instruments like guitar, e-drum, and listening to music, etc. What contains in the package: 1*Wired headphones 1*Pouch for headphones 1*3.5 mm audio cable 1*Dual-duty cable for 6.35mm and 3.5mm sockets 1*User manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OneOdio A71 Hi-Rez Studio Recording Headphones Review
reviews.reviewText: The OneOdio A71 Hi-Res Studio Recording Headphones are an impressive option for those seeking high-quality audio performance without breaking the bank. These headphones offer a well-rounded combination of comfort, sound quality, and versatility.The A71 headphones feature 50mm neodymium drivers that deliver a clear and balanced sound profile. The Hi-Res audio support ensures that you can enjoy your music with exceptional detail and accuracy. Whether you're listening to music, watching movies, or working on audio recordings, these headphones provide a rich audio experience.Comfort is key during extended listening sessions, and the A71 doesn't disappoint. The adjustable headband and cushioned ear cups offer a snug fit that doesn't sacrifice comfort. The headphones' foldable design makes them portable and convenient for on-the-go use.OneOdio has also taken versatility into account. The A71 comes with two detachable cables – one coiled and one straight – which is particularly handy for studio recording setups or casual listening. The headphones' closed-back design helps isolate sound, enhancing the immersive experience.While the audio quality is generally excellent, some audiophiles might notice a slight emphasis on bass. Additionally, the build quality, while decent, might not match the premium feel of higher-end headphones. However, given the price point, the build is more than satisfactory.In conclusion, the OneOdio A71 Hi-Res Studio Recording Headphones provide an impressive balance of audio quality, comfort, and versatility. Whether you're a music enthusiast, a content creator, or just someone who values good sound, these headphones offer a compelling option at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have two pairs I use for studio listening while playing guitar. They are comfortable, well made, and have great sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value, decent sound.
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are fine for my purposes, mostly watching TV late at night after my wife has gone to sleep. I can run the TV sound through my stereo amplifier, turn off the speakers and turn the volume up as much as I care to. These are not "Pro" headphones, but I'm not using them in a critical process, such as mixing music from a recording console. The fit is fine and they're quite comfortable. Good buy. Thanks Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected and better!
reviews.reviewText: I did expect these to be decent headphones without knowing much about them. These were at a price point where I felt it, worthy to take a gamble and buy by them. So just to try them out, I purchased them and shipped them to my apartment. I get my tablet out because it's the only thing I've got readily available with a ¼" TRS jack for headphones. I listen to mainly heavy metal and I also like some EDM of different varieties. They sounded great, as expected. So I had to see if they met other expectations. I got a guitar amplifier out, a small Yamaha practice amp. I also got out my Schecter Damien 8 Platinum with 808Xs. And I played the nastiest riffs into that Yamaha. These little headphones were loud and overwhelming, while being clear and precise to the tone. You couldn't tell a difference between the raw tone coming out of the speaker, and the sound coming from the headphones. The only difference was your atmospheric noise pollution was cancelled out. It's kinda like a personal sound room or studio experienced. These headphones are worth it. If you jam, give these a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Headphones I’ve used in this price range.
reviews.reviewText: I loved these headphones, for the price they don’t sacrifice build or sound quality offering a great package. The build quality on these are better than some over-ear monitors >$100! The ear-pads are rather meh not being too shabby but feeling uncomfortably warm after about an hour or two for me. But I think the flexibility of the headphones help make up for it. Great entry-level headphones that work decently well for mixing audio!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sounding headphones
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these for home use. They are larger than i had expected, but do collapse down into a carry bag, that is included in the purchase. Come with 2 different cord options. Ear pads fully cover listener's ear, which reduces background noise. While these are not actively 'noise cancelling', this fitment does block out some ambient background noise pretty well.Once on your head, there is a little pressure on your ears/side of head, but the padding on the ear pieces does help keep these comfortable.Sounds are clear, delivering the highs and lows quite well. I have used these with a couple different portable MP3 players, and the headphones have been able to take max volume and still maintain sound clarity. Other than for rating purposes, I don't think it would be advisable to utilize these at that volume level for extended time, but these will punish your ear drums if that is something you are looking for.Nothing but good things to say about these after a week of ownership. Hoping they last for a while!

Chegou 7 dias antes do prazo, simplesmente perfeito, vem com os dois cabos como informou, super embalado, com essa capinha para o fone que é linda, o som sai muito perfeito e isola muito bem ruídos externos !! Super recomendo!!
El sonido es perfecto 👌Se escuchan muy bienExcelente calidad y cómodos

I bought these headphones based on reviews for the start of a Podcast. We needed 4 sets and budget was a consideration. They have proven to be what everyone has claimed and we are seriously pleased with this purchase.Well made, extremely comfortable, even over longer periods of wear and a crisp clean audio signal that is very well suited to dialog which is what we needed. Musically, they are very impressive as well. I own many, many different headphones, most of which are MUCH more expensive than these, bought for more musical applications but amazingly, at this price point these have proven themselves to be amazing for a Podcast application. Don't spend a ton of money for nothing, give these a try, I very much doubt, that you will regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent noise cancelling headphones for Audio typist
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to cancel out talking noise in a noisy office. I type letters in my job and had difficulty in hearing the audio recording in office using the noise cancelling headphones which my employer provided me with. These are excellent, you can adjust the tone and adjust each ear's headphone. They are flexible and can be easily adjusted and soft to touch over ears and has soft band lining where it rests over your head. Very comfortable and I love using these. Reasonably priced too.
